channel.title: Droplist Help
channel.description:
#tormented demon 8349:40
what's the ratio for drops if :40? ... like .4%? or 4% or what lol, never understood the pointless value that was coded in that way.

item.title: Droplist Help
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

the 40 stay for the kills.
like u need to kill 40 demons before u can get a rare drop

Read full topic

item.title: Droplist Help
item.dc:creator: @TSK_Ben TSK_Ben
item.description:
@TSK_Ben wrote:

Using abstract-pk, and if
“monster”:“40%”
[drop][ammount]
[rare drop][ammount]

does the rare drop still count as a 40%?

Edit:

bandos sub boss:150, that was base set, does that mean it drops 150%?

Read full topic

item.title: Droplist Help
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

it might help to look where it is read
[/quote]

Gtfo. if your not going to be helpful, do not comment.

@ontopic

its math 1 - 100 its 40%

well its 40% in my old base… dunno about yours, would be helpful if you said what base you are using,[/quote]

how am i not helping you moron? it was all i could provide in a general programming board where as his help thread provided absolutely no useful information at all.

item.title: Droplist Help
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“TSK_Ben, post:3, topic:430596”]I don’t understand what you mean by that.

Tormented demons are set to 40, but tzhaar were set to 10. I still found nowhere that says a number is a base set % or anything.[/quote]

it your game isn’t using that data then it is just text in a text file. look harder.

Read full topic
